pages.text: Next is the industrial blast furnace, our first multiblock structure. We will need heating coils (save up 8 nickel ingots for that) and standard machine casings, not to be confused with basic machine frames.
Can also be used to produce some vanilla iron items cheaper. For the coils, order 4 copper and 4 nickel ingots alternating around the center.

pages.title: Std. Machine Casing
pages.text: We will need 9 basic machine frames and 18 electronic circuits for the needed standard machine casings alone. With the additional ingots for the recipe, that are 144 iron ingots needed.

pages.title: Ind. Blast Furnace
pages.text: All TechReborn multiblock structures have holograms showing us how they are built together, once manually activated by using the placed down controller block.

pages.title: Ind. Blast Furnace
pages.text: Inside can be empty or filled with lava. The
latter is recommended. Besides being used for progression, the industrial blast furnace has other uses like smelting glass planes back to glass, or metal armor back to ingots, if some sand is added.
